charges.description: USED DEPARTMENT PROPERTY IN THE EXECUTION OF A PRACTICAL JOKE.
CAUSED DAMAGE TO A BATHROOM LOCATED INSIDE OF A DEPARTMENT FACILITY.
USED HIS PERSONAL VIDEO CAMERA TO RECORD THE EXECUTION OF TWO (2) SEARCH WARRANTS WITHOUT PERMISSION OR AUTHORITY TO DO SO.
FAILED TO PROVIDE A COPY OF THE VIDEP RECORDINGS TO OFFICE OF QUEENS DISTRICT ATTORNEY.

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO RESPOND TO THE SCENE OF A DEPARTMENTAL VEHICLE ACCIDENT TO ASCERTAIN DETAILS OF THE COLLISION AND ASSUME THE ROLE OF INVESTIGATING SUPERVISOR.
WHILE ON-DUTY,  DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO CONDUCT A CANVASS FOR WITNESSES, INTERVIEW WITNESSES, AND OBTAIN ANY VIDEO SURVEILLANCE OF A DEPARTMENTAL VEHICLE ACCIDENT AS THE INVESTIGATING SUPERVISOR.
